marklogic.body: I've Always like TJ it sucks he was stuck in Sacco's doghouse most the time because he was good when he did play even on the top lines. With that said I don't see San Jose resigning him because even before he was injured he was a healthy scratch. I know it's a long shot but if he hits the market this summer and Hejduk retires I wouldn't mind bringing back TJ to fill Dukes Spot, but I don't really see that happening if Sacco is still here.Â
